dedicatedCloud_datacenter_drp_subtitle: Build your Disaster Recovery Plan with Zerto
dedicatedCloud_datacenter_drp_details_EP: Protect your operating system by configuring a Disaster Recovery Plan. In just one click, you can migrate your infrastructure if you experience any technical issues or service interruptions. Please note that you must have a secondary Private Cloud before you activate this option.
dedicatedCloud_datacenter_drp_warning: Your datacentre does not currently have any hosts. Please order one to use this datacentre for your DRP, or select a datacentre with at least one host.
dedicatedCloud_datacenter_ovh_choice_EPC: Between two OVH Private Cloud solutions
dedicatedCloud_datacenter_onPremise_choi: Between your infrastructure and an OVH Private Cloud solution
